name: If I... Would You...
description:
Heya there my hushpuppies, it's Eacconger and I have another video on my new game, If I... Would You...

If I... Would You... is an interactive story all about guilt and facing the past and your mistakes. The story focuses on our Unnamed Protagonist's/MC's thoughts and feelings towards his friend's death.

Here's a link to the gameplay video I made!

Also, sorry that the thumbnail isn't super amazing or anything. Not verified on YouTube yet ✌

Note(s): Also, just wanted to let you all know that the glitches in the text are intentional. The glitched out text isn't meant to be read or make sense. It's just a little fun glitch I found out my mistake while making the game that I decided to keep in because I felt like it added to the ominous atmosphere of the game 😁
